body: The invite was probably deleted because it's a private group that they only want invited people joining. I think they're all being stupid and exclusive (you know how I feel about that), but I've stumbled upon one or two myself by accident and they're not sinister. They're just trying to lay low. Usually, it's some project they want to choose who their first members are for a while or it's just a hangout group for chit chatting. It just seems like certain users (lsuch as luk, seq, angst, villain, acikek, etc.) always get invited to these kinds of groups for whatever reason. I have no idea why, but they always seem to. In fact, the screenshots look like they came from multiple different servers, likely including the few I'm in and probably even the normal ruqqus discord server. The roles and setup of the servers screenshotted don't even line up with each other.

parent.body: The invite was probably deleted because it's a private group that they only want invited people joining. I think they're all being stupid and exclusive (you know how I feel about that), but I've stumbled upon one or two myself by accident and they're not sinister. They're just trying to lay low. Usually, it's some project they want to choose who their first members are for a while or it's just a hangout group for chit chatting. It just seems like certain users (lsuch as luk, seq, angst, villain, acikek, etc.) always get invited to these kinds of groups for whatever reason. I have no idea why, but they always seem to. In fact, the screenshots look like they came from multiple different servers, likely including the few I'm in and probably even the normal ruqqus discord server. The roles and setup of the servers screenshotted don't even line up with each other.

parent.body: The invite was probably deleted because it's a private group that they only want invited people joining. I think they're all being stupid and exclusive (you know how I feel about that), but I've stumbled upon one or two myself by accident and they're not sinister. They're just trying to lay low. Usually, it's some project they want to choose who their first members are for a while or it's just a hangout group for chit chatting. It just seems like certain users (lsuch as luk, seq, angst, villain, acikek, etc.) always get invited to these kinds of groups for whatever reason. I have no idea why, but they always seem to. In fact, the screenshots look like they came from multiple different servers, likely including the few I'm in and probably even the normal ruqqus discord server. The roles and setup of the servers screenshotted don't even line up with each other.

As long as they came down on the side of anti-censorship in the end and they continue that course, I don't think it much matters - not right now anyway. Ruqqus is still a new site. They're still new to running it and they're probably pretty young themselves.

The dv bombing issue needs to be resolved.
